Timeline

A rough chronology of key moments around DIAS — meant as an orienting map while we’re still collecting documents, actors, and dates.

  • 2014

    Initial investigation

  • 2016

    Public disclosure

  • 2019

    Legal proceedings

2013

Early system pilots / procurement groundwork (placeholder)

2017

DIAS introduced into parts of asylum procedure (placeholder)

2021

Policy/legal debates and expert evidence framing (placeholder)

2025

Thesis investigation updates; mapping actors & documents (placeholder)

2014

Institutional rollout discussions (placeholder)

2019

Critique intensifies (opacity, bias, evidentiary role) (placeholder)

2023

Ongoing reporting + civil society attention (placeholder)

Archival platform for my Master's thesis. Built with Eleventy & vanilla JS.
